verses.roman:
kaśyapo 'trir vasiṣṭhaś ca
viśvāmitro 'tha gautamaḥ
jamadagnir bharadvāja
iti saptarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ

synonyms: kaśyapaḥ—Kaśyapa; atriḥ—Atri; vasiṣṭhaḥ—Vasiṣṭha; ca—and; viśvāmitraḥ—Viśvāmitra; atha—as well as; gautamaḥ—Gautama; jamadagniḥ—Jamadagni; bharadvājaḥ—Bharadvāja; iti—thus; sapta-ṛṣayaḥ—the seven sages; smṛtāḥ—celebrated.
translation: Kaśyapa, Atri, Vasiṣṭha, Viśvāmitra, Gautama, Jamadagni and Bharadvāja are known as the seven sages.
